comments.title: Comment Management
comments.likeFail: Like failed, please try again later
comments.replyFail: Reply failed, please try again later
comments.deleteFail: Delete failed, please try again later
comments.blockFail: Failed to block user, please try again later

mobileStudio.title: Creator's Studio
mobileStudio.message: To provide you with the best creative experience, we recommend accessing the Creator's Studio on a desktop device. On a larger screen, you can more easily manage your works, view data analytics, and handle copyright matters.
mobileStudio.suggestion: Please visit this page on a computer or tablet device to access the full Creator's Studio functionality.

content.originalWorks: The InWorlds platform encourages authors to create original works. The copyright of all original works published on this platform belongs to the individual authors.
content.copyrightComplaints: Authors are responsible for the content they publish on the InWorlds platform. Any legal responsibilities related to plagiarism, infringement, or other misconduct are borne by the authors. The InWorlds platform will assist in handling related issues within reasonable limits.
content.nonCommercialUse: Works published on the InWorlds platform are primarily for non-commercial purposes. If authors wish to use their works for commercial purposes, it is recommended to communicate with the platform in advance to ensure compliance with relevant regulations and mutual interests.
content.platformRights: For works that may violate this statement, InWorlds will first communicate with the author to seek a joint solution. Only when communication is ineffective and there is a clear violation confirmed, the platform may take necessary measures, such as temporarily removing or deleting the related content. We promise to fully consider and respect the author's rights before taking any action.
content.complaintHandling: If you believe that a work on the platform infringes your copyright, please contact us promptly. We will take every complaint seriously and investigate and handle it appropriately based on the information provided.
content.userAgreement: We sincerely invite you to carefully read this disclaimer before using the InWorlds platform. If you have any questions or concerns about any terms, please feel free to contact us for discussion. We value good communication with users and are committed to providing a fair and transparent creative environment for all users.
content.applicableLaw: This disclaimer is subject to the laws of the jurisdiction where InWorlds operates. In case of any dispute, we will seek a solution through dialogue based on the principles of mutual understanding and friendly negotiation. If negotiations fail, the matter will be handled according to the relevant laws and regulations of the operating location.

studio.userLoadingError: Unable to load user information. Please log in again or try later.

notifications.unpublishSuccess: The work has been successfully unpublished
notifications.publishSuccess: The work has been successfully published
notifications.deleteSuccess: The work has been successfully deleted

confirmations.unpublish: Are you sure you want to unpublish this work?
confirmations.publish: Are you sure you want to publicly publish this work?
confirmations.delete: Are you sure you want to delete this work?
